name: MetadataRenamer
description: MetadataRenamer automatically renames series folders, season folders, and episode files when you identify a series in Jellyfin. Series format: {SeriesName} ({Year}) [{provider}-{id}], e.g. 'The Flash (2014) [tvdb-279121]'. For anime and long-running shows, when metadata reports Season 1 but files are in Season 2+ folders, the plugin keeps episodes in the correct season folder. Renames when provider IDs change, with dry-run mode, collision checks, and per-item cooldown.

versions.changelog: Fix: prefer path-derived season when metadata says Season 1 but file is in Season 2+ folder; keeps episodes in correct season folders (Season 01–21). Series and season folder renaming on metadata identification.

Fix: prefer path-derived season when metadata says Season 1 but file is in Season 2+ folder; keeps episodes in correct season folders (Season 01–21). Series and season folder renaming on metadata identification.

overview: Renames series folders to {SeriesName} ({Year}) [{provider}-{id}], season folders, and episode files; keeps episodes in correct season folders when metadata misreports season.
